page.title: 17MEDIA
page.content:
Local Newspapers. In{Chelford}we can buy lots of local newspapers. These are some of them - Knutsford Guardian, Wilmslow Express Advertiser, Congleton Chronicle, Macclesfield Express and there are two free papers - Town and Country and Wilmslow World.
Local Radio. Here are some of the radio stations we can receive:BBC Radio Manchester, Piccadilly(Manchester), Radio City(Liverpool), Radio Signal (Stoke-on-Trent)and Marcher Sound (Wrexham.)
Local Television. The local Independent television company is Granada Television.
